metadata.title: CVE-2018-14498 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
get_8bit_row in rdbmp.c in libjpeg-turbo through 1.5.90 and MozJPEG through 3.3.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted 8-bit BMP in which one or more of the color indices is out of range for the number of palette entries.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-14498` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 2.0.6-0ubuntu2
libjpeg-turbo-test - 2.0.6-0ubuntu2
libjpeg-turbo8 - 2.0.6-0ubuntu2
libturbojpeg - 2.0.6-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.6-0ubuntu2').
